H0.text: Which Scottish club's nickname is 'The Diamonds. Aberdeen

H1.text: Which Scottish club's nickname is 'The Diamonds. Dundee

H2.text: Which Scottish club's nickname is 'The Diamonds. Dunfermline Athletic

H3.text: Which Scottish club's nickname is 'The Diamonds. Aidrieonians

A4.text: Airdrieonians' nickname is 'The Diamonds', which has also been adopted by Airdrie.

A5.text: The design of Airdrieonians' distinctive playing colours of a white shirt with a red diamond was the basis of their nickname, The Diamonds.
